Articles.Content: Hey guys, new on the forum, thought I'd introduce myself. I've been playing the game since the Mun was the only place to aim for (and hitting it was a significant achievement for me). Completely in love with this game!
Another long-time lurker climbs forth into the daylight? Hello Black_sod.
that's it exactly! Decided I want to be more involved in the community and here I am haha!
It's a fun place. You'll like it.

Well I would say if you need help with planes PM me but your a vet soooo

Welcome to the family!

I'm a vet who's been trying very hard to avoid planes the bane of my existence. I've always found a way to get rockets to do a planes (job more or less). I'll definitely look ya up if i decide to branch out
